name: PSP Car Dodger
description:
A very simple game I made to learn the basics of PSP development using the QuickGame library.

Github repository: https://github.com/HendersonSoftworks/PSP-Car-Dodger

QuickGame library: https://github.com/IridescentRose/QuickGame

Controls UP/DOWN ButtonMoves car to top/bottom roadsSTART Button Resets the game
